item.title: Why cant i post a screenie?
item.dc:creator: @Mladen Mladen
item.description:
@Mladen wrote:

ok well take a screen open paint go to edit and paste it there and save then go to www.photobucket.com or www.imageshack.us and upload there using the dimensions you want and then look for the one that starts like this:[IMG]

Np
